entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:57 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
